gr.forth.ics.graph
Class GraphCloner

java.lang.Object
  gr.forth.ics.graph.GraphCloner

public class GraphCloner
extends Object

This class provides a simple utility to create copies of graphs. Also provides, upon request, maps to navigate from a copied node/edge to each copy counterpart, and/or the reverse.

Nested Class Summary
static class GraphCloner.GraphMapper

          Copies the specified graph, into the supplied graph instance, and returns the copy.
 Map<Edge,Edge> getEdgeMap()
          Returns a modifiable map with edges, the semantics of which is defined in the GraphCopier constructor.
 Map<Node,Node> getNodeMap()
          Returns a modifiable map with nodes, the semantics of which is defined in the GraphCopier constructor.

Constructor Detail

GraphCloner

public GraphCloner(boolean copyData,
                   Direction nodeMapDirection,
                   Direction edgeMapDirection)
Creates a GraphCloner.

Parameters:
copyData - if true, copies (shallow copy) internal node and edge data (via Tuple.copyInto(Tuple) method).
nodeMapDirection - specifies what the node map return value of getNodeMap() should have. Possible values:
  • null : node map will be null
  • Direction.OUT : each source node will be a key, with its copy counterpart as value.
  • Direction.IN : each copied node will be a key, with its source counterpart as value.
  • Direction.EITHER : Both Direction.IN and Direction.OUT, as above, combined in the same map.
    edgeMapDirection - specifies what the edge map return value of getEdgeMap() should have. Possible values:
  • null : edge map will be null
  • Direction.OUT : each source edge will be a key, with its copy counterpart as value.
  • Direction.IN : each copied edge will be a key, with its source counterpart as value.
  • Direction.EITHER : Both Direction.IN and Direction.OUT, as above, combined in the same map.
    • Method Detail

    copy

    public Graph copy(InspectableGraph source,
                  Graph copy)
    Copies the specified graph, into the supplied graph instance, and returns the copy.

    Parameters:
    source - the graph to be copied (must be non-null)
    copy - the graph into which to create the copy (must be non-null)
    Returns:
    the graph copy (same as second parameter)

    getNodeMap

    public Map<Node,Node> getNodeMap()
    Returns a modifiable map with nodes, the semantics of which is defined in the GraphCopier constructor.

    getEdgeMap

    public Map<Edge,Edge> getEdgeMap()
    Returns a modifiable map with edges, the semantics of which is defined in the GraphCopier constructor.
